rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall designed with Art Deco elements, using geometric patterns and rich materials that resonate with Vastu guidelines. The space is intended to welcome the family while aligning with the auspicious direction of North.
A spacious living room with an Art Deco design accentuated by modern lighting and elegant furniture. The layout is optimized for joint family gatherings.
A well-lit dining room adjacent to the living area, designed with Art Deco motifs and ergonomic seating to encourage family bonding.
A functional kitchen with an Art Deco style, featuring high-end finishes and modern appliances. Designed with a focus on workflow and safety in line with Vastu principles.
A guest bathroom with Art Deco fixtures and thoughtful placement according to Vastu guidelines.
A guest room designed for occasional visitors, featuring Art Deco accents and comfortable furnishings.
Master bedroom with Art Deco design elements, ensuring a restful environment. Placed in an ideal Vastu position.
Additional bedroom designed for joint family members, featuring Art Deco styling and comfortable furnishings.
Service area including storage and utility spaces, designed to be efficient while blending with the farmhouse aesthetic.

openings.description: A grand North-facing entrance door that sets the tone for the Art Deco farmhouse, ensuring smooth energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
A two-car garage entrance integrated with the farmhouse design, offering ease of access and adhering to functional aesthetics.
Stylish windows in the living room with Art Deco frames, ensuring natural light and ventilation as per Vastu recommendations.
Practical windows in the kitchen designed to maximize daylight, following both aesthetic and Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Additional master bedroom on the first floor, designed with Art Deco elegance and attention to Vastu principles.
A bedroom dedicated to the joint family member, incorporating Art Deco design and balanced Vastu placement.
Another bedroom for joint family members, ensuring comfort and alignment with both design aesthetics and Vastu.
A study room with Art Deco influences, designed for quiet work and reflective activities.
A private balcony with Art Deco detailing, offering a serene outdoor space in line with Vastuâ€™s emphasis on natural surroundings.

openings.description: Art Deco styled windows on the first floor designed to enhance natural light and provide ventilation.
A balcony door offering access to the outdoor space, integrating with the farmhouse's overall design theme.
